    • Get Started: Chinese Version-Procedure

Get the Multi-level Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) categories and description for ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on procedures.

IcdPrToCCSLvl.Rd

Multi-leve Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) for ICD-9 and ICD-10 procedure codes in clinical procedures data is a procedure categorization scheme. Four levels exist in the multi-level procedure CCS for ICD-9-CM codes, and two levels exist in the multi-level procedure CCS for ICD-10-CM codes

IcdPrToCCSLvl(PrDataFile, idColName, icdColName, dateColName,
  icd10usingDate, CCSLevel = 1, CCSLvlLabel = TRUE)

Arguments

PrDataFile

A file of clinical diagnostic data with at least 3 columns: "MemberID", "ICD", "Date"
idColName

A column for MemberID of PrDataFile
icdColName

A column for ICD of PrDataFile
dateColName

A column for Date of PrDataFile
icd10usingDate

icd 10 using date
CCSLevel

Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) multiple level
CCSLvlLabel

Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) multiple level categories/description for icd9/10, default is True

Source

ICD-9-PCS CCS (2015)

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/ccs/Single_Level_CCS_2015.zip

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/ccs/Multi_Level_CCS_2015.zip

ICD-10-PCS CCS (2019)

https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/ccs10/ccs_pr_icd10pcs_2019_1.zip

Details

return Multi-leve Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) categories or description based on ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes

Examples

head(samplePrFile)
#>    ID   ICD       Date
#> 1:  B  5681 2008-01-14
#> 2:  A  9774 2009-01-11
#> 3:  B 44.99 2009-05-10
#> 4:  C 07.59 2009-01-21
#> 5:  B  0205 2008-07-06
#> 6:  B  8812 2007-06-27
IcdPrToCCSLvl(samplePrFile, ID, ICD, Date, "2015-10-01", 2, TRUE)
#>   [1] "Other OR therapeutic procedures of urinary tract"
